attributes.content: 2:10 P.M. \ Clear
Wolumonde, Leithania. Once a bustling hub of commerce, this nomadic town is now rarely seen by outsiders.
Rathaus
Schultz Severin Hawthorn, where have you been?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: How are we supposed to get anything done in a strategic planning session without you?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Was I here when you decided my son’s fate?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Well... Tatjana should already have...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Yes, she told me. You had her tell me. I’m only reminding you what you’ve done.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What’s the situation?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The Infected are still protesting. They’ve even started chasing off Infected newcomers.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: What do they want?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They... they believe the fire was part of some kind of plot. They demand an explanation for Dr. Atro and the dead Infected.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: A plot? An explanation? Great, someone must be riling them up.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Even the Infected wouldn’t stoop that low. Most of them are from Wolumonde.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Have they had any contact with that militant group out there?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: None, for now.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: But the militants have been lingering around the outskirts of the hamlet. I’m worried they might influence the protestors.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Just a second, it’s from the sentry—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Two? Infected?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: They claim to be from Rhodes Island? I know that name—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: That would be Dr. Atro’s company. *Sigh.* We knew this was coming.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Wh-what do we do?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Dr. Atro was a respectable Infected. They may be here looking for her. And they have a right to know the truth.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Let them in.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...You heard him. Do as he says.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Hmm, are you sure about this? What if they have something to do with the militants out there?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Between the Great Rift, the fire, and the Infected, do we have the luxury to be suspicious of everyone who knocks on our door?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What about after they learn the truth? What if Rhodes Island seeks reparations from us? How much is Wolumonde to suffer?!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: ...So what should we do?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Lock our doors and send them away? Lie to them? Tell them Dr. Atro took some Oripathy patients out on a hike?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I know we can’t sweep it under the rug. But you don’t have the final say in this. We have to prepare for the worst.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: No one has the final say on the truth, but... Never mind. Do as you will.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I’m leaving.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Leaving? Where are you going this time?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: ...I have a problem to solve.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: My only job is to get this town back on track. The decision-making process? I have little patience for your political games.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hey! Wait!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I know you’re suffering, and there’s so much we could’ve done better, but we had no choice!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I understand. That’s why I’m still talking to you nice and peacefully.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I’ll leave Rhodes Island to you. You’re good at these things. I’ll walk the blocks.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: That’s the deal.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Severin! Severin Hawthorn! You are this town’s Schultz! You can’t be running all over the—
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Ugh! Must he always...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Forget it. Tatjana, Severin, Thor. They’re all tragic figures, really.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Let’s get this place cleaned up. Rhodes Island will be here soon.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Wolumonde. Its name means 'The Eighth Moon,' and together with seven other nearby towns, it makes up Leithania’s flourishing northern trade network—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That’s what the book said, anyway.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: From what I’m seeing, 'flourishing trade' isn’t exactly how I’d describe it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Could it be because of the 'Great Rift' thing?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yes. A Catastrophe of that scale is rare. It could be more than a thousand meters deep, with exposed active Originium on the cliffsides. I shudder just thinking about it.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But, Miss Folinic... You were very curious what would happen if you lobbed a shell into it...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Nay, that was just my academic curiosity speaking. Realistically, one wrong move and the entire plateau could get cleaved in half.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Considering the detour we had to take, looks like this town won’t be moving an inch.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Visitors at a time like this? And such strange clothes. I hope this isn’t an ill omen...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Look at her tails. Oh, and the crystals on her shoulder! Is she Infected?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: But those clothes look familiar... Where have I seen them before...?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: M-Miss Folinic, can we really just walk down the street like this?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The prevalence of Originium Arts in Leithania have brought two major benefits: first, the incredible music scene, and second, a broad tolerance of the Infected.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: There may be restrictions on your personal freedom, but should you want to live, you can win back that right as long as you’re willing to pay the price.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: ...Price?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: At least it’s something affordable.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Wolumonde may be in the boonies and have its fair share of problems, but at least the Infected have a place to live... That’s what she told me anyway—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: —Oh, someone’s coming.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Hm? That man’s uniform...)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (Is he with the Wolumonde Gendarmerie? Should we ask for directions?)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (He’s coming toward us. Is this the welcoming committee?)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (I’m not sure...)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Oh, he lit a cigarette.)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (He put his lighter into his pocket. Now he’s holding the cigarette with his other hand. He switched hands again—)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (—He walked away without looking back! Miss Folinic!)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Excuse me—!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hello, we’re—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Ah, Rhodes Island, I take it?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The Rathaus is just up ahead, right in front of the tallest tower. You see it? Good. Someone will meet you there.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Er, thanks. Can I ask your name...?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Me? I’m off duty.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Um, what?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I’m off duty. And I really don’t want to talk so much when I’m off... I have my own business to deal with.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: That’s the deal. Later.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And he’s gone?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: He was kind of rude, but I think he’s been through a lot...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hah... as if we’re not tired!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But at least he told us where to go. Let’s go talk to the local—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Schultz! There you are!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: The Infected are protesting again. The Gendarmerie are already on the scene, but they need you there leading them—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Ah! You’re smoking! Did the shopkeepers get to you again? Please, you have an image to maintain. You wouldn’t want to lose the trust of the people—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hm? What is it?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: ...That’s a... Schultz? A 'Schultheiß' is like a local leader?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Is something wrong, Schultz?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: No. You’re always working so hard, Tatjana. I admire you.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Do you? Thank you—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Now, about those two, they’re not from around here, are they? Could they be the doctors from Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Oh? Well, yes. We are indeed. I am Folinic and this is Suzuran.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Doctors?)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (I think we count.)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: (Even me?)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: (I’m a fully-fledged operator assigned to the Medical Department. And Lisa, you’ve... studied with Dr. Kal'tsit, so we can call you a medical intern. I guess.)
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I see... Oh! You two must be on your way to the Rathaus? I’m so sorry to get in your way!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Of course it should be the Schultz who receives you, but he really is needed at Zwölftontechnik Strasse... Er...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Oh, really, he can—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Ahem! Very good, Tatjana, you take them. I’ll go look into this Infected situation.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You two.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: —Yes?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I know why you’re here. But our situation is dire.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Do you know what happened to Wolumonde?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The Great Rift.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Yes. I get to skip over so much when dealing with smart people.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So now the Infected are more riled up than ever before. If you don’t want to get mixed up in that, stay away from Zwölftontechnik Strasse.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We are experts at dealing with the Infected.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I know. We had a Dr. Atro from your company working closely with us.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So you know we can help.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We don’t need it yet. It wouldn’t be right to drag our guests into this mess as soon as they’ve arrived. That would get us into trouble too.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...So what is Atro doing here?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: She’s not here right now.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So where is she?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: She...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Oh no! Fighting has broken out!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Th-those Infected have weapons! What’s going on?!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: They’ve got blades! Are they going to kill us?
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Schultz!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: ...I know.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: You two are Infected experts, yes?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Severin
